instance.name: Image Field Id
instance.description: The id of the asset field for which the data URI should be generated.

instance.name: Max width
instance.description: (Images only) The maximum width of the preview image. If both width and height are set, the preview image will be cropped to fit.

instance.name: Max height
instance.description: (Images only) The maximum height of the preview image. If both width and height are set, the preview image will be cropped to fit.
